Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides press access to open meetings of an agency or authority and requires notice of such meetings to local governments
Summary: Defines "professional journalist"; provides press access to open meanings of an agency or authority; prohibits the adoption of policies or rules restricting such access; requires notice of such meetings to local governments.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to providing press access to open meetings of an agency or authority
